body.name: SONGMICS Metal Storage Cabinet with Mesh Doors, Steel Display Cabinets with Adjustable Shelves for Bathroom Home Office, Black UOMC002B01
features: [What Can It Be] A file cabinet in your office? Yup. Sideboard cabinet in your dining room? No problem. Entryway cabinet? Certainly. Storage cabinet? Well, that’s a given. This is how versatile this cabinet will always be!
[Can Tall Items Fit?] You bet. With height-adjustable shelves, this storage rack offers a cozy home for both short and tall items, large family photograph album, holiday mementos, trophies...welcome!
[2 Mesh Doors, 3 Pros] 2 mesh doors allow for good ventilation yet offer the functionality of masking sundries while also adding that sought-after element of openness—a trio of functions!

[Reassuring] Made of durable and long-lasting steel, this 15.7"D x 31.5"W x 41.3"H mesh storage cabinet provides sturdy support for your items; also, the matte, powder coatings make cleaning a much easier process
[What You Get] A multi-purpose metal cabinet with magnetic locks and rubber buffers for closing quietly and tightly, numbered parts to facilitate assembly, anti-toppling kit for added safety

productInformation.name: Included Components
productInformation.value: 1 x Storage Cabinet, 1 x Accessory Kit, 1 x Instructions

productInformation.name: Material Steel Cabinet, Aluminum Alloy Handle

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Adjustable Height Equidistant holes on both sides allow you to easily adjust heights according to your needs. Steel Mesh Door Visible mesh doors allow better air permeability and facilitate locating the items you stored. Rubber Buffers and Magnetic Locks The rubber buffers on the lower parts and magnetic locks on the upper parts of the doors allow them to be closed quietly and tightly without a noisy, loud “clang.” Keep It Stable The cabinet comes with adjustable feet to keep it perfectly stable, even when the floor is slightly uneven.

It's Only for the Office? Nope. Make it an entrance cabinet to store your out-the-door essentials, use it as a storage rack in your living room to hold books or an art collection, or blend it in alongside your kitchen counters—this all-rounder can always be in full play. Quality Matters: This office cabinet is made of sturdy and durable powder-coated steel and offers a load capacity of 55 lb per shelf. The adjustable feet are also provided to hold your items evenly and safely. Specifications: Color: BlackMaterial: Steel Cabinet, Aluminum Alloy HandleProduct Size: 15.7"D x 31.5"W x 41.3"H (40 x 80 x 105 cm)Product Weight: 43 lb (19.5 kg)Max. Static Load Capacity Per Shelf: 55 lb (25 kg) Package Contents: 1 x Storage Cabinet1 x Accessory Kit1 x Instructions SONGMICS Notes: An electric drill is required for assembly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I live in a small studio apartment and needed additional storage. I wanted something that was visually appealing and cost effective and this has been perfect for my small space. It’s incredibly sturdy and very easy to put together. Extremely happy with my order!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice looking cabinet at a great price. Was not hard to put together with an electric screwdriver. Took about an hour. Great quality and looks nice in my home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes a great bar!
reviews.reviewText: I live in a small apartment and I needed a nice sized bar for a corner in my apartment. I did not want to spend a lot of money, but I was looking for something that would hold tall bottles. This was a great option for the price. Yes, it comes in several sections - and this might be easier put together with two people. However, I am a 5 foot woman and I had no issues putting this together. You just have to be a little bit creative but the end product is lovely.This is a very sturdy white material. It’s not glossy - it’s more on the textured side. However, I like this because it gives it more of a high end look. I was also pleasantly surprised with the doors because the pattern also gives it an upscale look. I actually did not put the door knobs that came with the unit – I purchased some gold knobs and it looks lovely.I also like the fact that the shelves are removable. Therefore, I only used one which allows me to have tall bottles on both shelves. Overall, great quality for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great, once its put together.
reviews.reviewText: Honestly, the piece itself isn't work $130.00, maybe $85-90 at most. Its metal but it can be flimsy if you don't set it up correctly. However the product looks really nice once its put together. I set the thing up by myself and it took maybe took a total of 3 hours to put together as the instructions were not very clear when they arrived, would recommend having two people if you have the option to do it. I also received some of the parts damaged as you can see through the pictures. Luckily most of the items we're damaged that faced the inside of the cabinet or the bottom so you don't see the damages. When placing in the shelving as well, it does recommend using an electric drill to put in the screws they provide you into tiny holes that you can barely see if you don't have a lot of light. The electric drill didn't do much for me so I did everything by hand as it was easier. It does provide screws for you to place it into the wall to make it sturdier. Overall, I would say its a decent item, I love the mesh doors but I wouldn't recommend putting anything on top of it thats heavy unless you screw the item into the wall for more support.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adorable and affordable storage!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I love these!!! As you will see in the video, all my kids hand prints 😂 black is not the best for looking clean 100% of the time. But these are so easy to wipe down the color doesn’t bother me. I love how they look in our home! They have so much storage and we’re very easy to put together. Love that they are metal because they are light but also durable! 10/10 recommend to anyone! We have two in our home and we love them so much we bought another one for my husbands office.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 72 yr old woman puts cabinet together with no problems!
reviews.reviewText: This cabinet is wonderful! I almost didn't get it because of the complaints about how hard it was to put together and you have to buy different screws and the holes don't match, etc.I decided to give it a chance and bought two blue ones because they matched my paint perfectly. All the holes match up. The screws work just fine. I will say that the directions are very confusing.. very short sentence and the drawings leave something to be desired - BUT - if you look at the pieces at the top and bottom and match the screws holes, you can almost do it blindfolded.One truth about the difficulty is that parts C and D are swapped in the directions. If you put D on the left and C on the right, it's a piece of cake.Love them. May order more in black.❤️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Sleek, well made and easy to put together!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very nice and big not high everything is great

5 stars. it is perfect size and design. I placed it at the entrance to use it as a shoe cabinet because it has ventilation and it is actually 14" depth. All the shoe cabinets in the market are 12" depth and will hardly fit my shoes.The color is also great. We love it and worked perfect for us.It was difficult to assemble and instructions were not clear.Put the screws for the legs first to hold it together. They only tell you to put the screws at the end. Enjoy the product

reviews.reviewTitle: Perfect as a home bar cabinet
reviews.reviewText: Bought two of these to use as a home bar cabinet and they're perfect for this. All metal so strong enough to store a lot and move around if needed without the fear of damaging them. Super easy to put together and instructions are easy to follow. The box/packaging they come in is very protective and the cabinets had no damage at all even if the outside boxes were beaten up.

reviews.reviewTitle: Very happy, but this does scratch
reviews.reviewText: I’m extremely happy with this cabinet. I think that it looks fantastic in the space in which we put it inThe shelves are a good height and being taller. I appreciate how high the cabinet is. He assembly was pretty easy despite what some people say in their reviews. No more complicated than IKEA furniture. The levelling legs were an added benefit, ensuring that the cabinet does not rattle or wiggle.I will say, though that this is metal and anytime you are opening a metal door that has a magnetic clasp. It’s going to make more noise then something like a wood, which will not produce an echo. I notice it more so when I’m closing the cabinet versus opening yet.The mesh doors are nice but it definitely doesn’t hide things at all.My one disappointment is how easy this cabinet can scratch. I put a ceramic pot on top of it, and slid the pot over , because there was a rough granular piece of the ceramic. It’s scratched the top of it. The scratch was minor but obviously when you have something brand new, you’d like to keep it looking that way. Regardless, I would still buy this again as we are very happy with it.
Looks good once it is together and is sturdy but the instructions really need to be updated - they are difficult to follow

I use the cabinet for art supplies and my Watercolor paintings. Love it and will likely order a second. I (senior) put it together on my own but recommend a second set of hands and a ratchet screw driver.
